message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper deals with video classification using deep neural networks, specifically 3D CNNs, which are commonly used in computer vision and machine learning (cs.CV). The focus is on motion and appearance representation, which is a common topic in deep learning research (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of GPUs for faster processing, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM). The proposed method involves learning motion representation, which is a sub-topic of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the use of deep neural networks for classification falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE).
